translation.Message_0_Page_0: As you know, Lena and I are investigating the virus. Its effect on living organisms has a very negative effect on their mental stability. Another symptom is the mass and physical strength of the organism increasing...<pause>
translation.Message_0_Page_1: So now we've begun developing a drug based on the composition of potatoes, Although with our current supplies, we lose almost 90% of the finished product. That's why I need a lot of potatoes. The potato will save the world!
translation.Response_0: I'll be sure to bring every potato I find...
